definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

pinyin: dian4 nao3 fu3 zhu4 she4 ji4 yu3 hui4 tu2

sentences.english: What's more, it will be bundled with MSI graphics cards when the software releases.
sentences.chinese: 什麼的，它會被捆綁微星繪圖卡時，軟件版本。

sentences.english: Drawing can be done with a finger or a stylus.
sentences.chinese: 繪圖可以用手指或手寫筆。

sentences.english: You might use this format if you're going to print your report to a plotter.
sentences.chinese: 如果您打算將報告打印到繪圖儀，可以使用此格式。

sentences.english: Review, check and supervise technical drawings produced by studio artists.
sentences.chinese: 審查，檢查及監督繪圖員製作的圖紙。

sentences.english: It is diagrammed in Figure 4 and can be referred to as a signaling cascade.
sentences.chinese: 它是在圖4中，繪圖，可稱爲一個信號級聯到。

sentences.english: Paper and board . characteristics of drawing paper.
sentences.chinese: 在白色繪圖紙上將編稿曬成藍圖。

sentences.english: This program can convert scanned geological maps or engineering drawings.
sentences.chinese: 此程序可轉換掃描的地質圖或者工程繪圖。

sentences.english: Drag onto the page to add a fish frame for cause-and-effect or fishbone diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 拖到繪圖頁後，可以爲因果圖或魚骨圖添加魚骨框架。

sentences.english: It all comes down to drawing shapes, selecting and shading them properly.
sentences.chinese: 這一切都歸結到繪圖形狀，妥善選擇和底紋。

sentences.english: However, there are some limits to vector drawing.
sentences.chinese: 但是，矢量繪圖也有一些限制。

sentences.english: Computer artwork of chains of Streptococcus pneumoniae bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 肺炎鏈球菌的電腦繪圖。

sentences.english: Please find the inverse function and sketch.
Drag onto the page, then right-click to show floating roof or sump.
sentences.chinese: 拖到繪圖頁上，然後右擊可顯示浮頂或貯槽。

sentences.english: Elements can be created using drag-and-drop gestures from the drawing palette.
sentences.chinese: 元素可以使用繪圖板的拖放功能創建。

sentences.english: This mode provides more screen area for diagram drawing.
sentences.chinese: 該模式爲圖表繪圖提供了更多的屏幕區域。
